thread.title_full: Review of new book by Damian Shiels on The Forgotten Irish who died in the American Civil War | American Civil War Forums

title: Review of new book by Damian Shiels on The Forgotten Irish who died in the American Civil War |
author: Pat Young
text:
I have reviewed Damian Shiels new book The Forgotten Irish. This book provides insights into the lives of three dozen Irish immigrant soldiers of the Civil War Era and their families in Ireland and America. Shiels bases his book on letters he uncovered in the pension file at the National Archives.
https://longislandwins.com/uncatego...tories-immigrant-soldiers-families-civil-war/
